name: Fate (itch) (Aniranth)
description:
This is a card game made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The game removes your ability to control death since a pact with the devil cursed you making your death imminent. Defeat the devil and reclaim your soul. But be wary of tempting fate.

Special thanks to Cakedust for the amazing artwork used in this game. Without this amazing art I don't think I could have made my first Game Jam game.

Note there are still some bugs namely, make sure you click end turn even if you have killed the boss.
